meanings.definition: A type of evergreen shrub or small tree with fragrant flowers.
meanings.sent1: The pittosporum in our garden has beautiful white flowers.
meanings.sent2: I planted a pittosporum in my backyard for its lovely scent.
meanings.sent3: The pittosporum whispered secrets to the roses in the garden.
meanings.sent4: The pittosporum stood tall like a guardian among the other plants.
meanings.sent5: The fragrance of the pittosporum filled the air with sweetness.

meanings.definition: The genus of plants to which the pittosporum belongs.
meanings.sent1: Many different species belong to the pittosporum genus.
meanings.sent2: The botanist studied the characteristics of the pittosporum genus.
meanings.sent3: In the forest, the pittosporum genus held a grand plant meeting.
meanings.sent4: The pittosporum genus was like a big family of greenery.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the pittosporum genus revealed a world of diversity.
